query: best hotels in Bangkok for women travelers
title: Best hotels in Bangkok for women travelers: Safe, clean, and great amenities
excerpt: Finding hotels in Bangkok that cater specifically to women travelers can be a daunting task. This list highlights safe, clean, and well-amenitized accommodations, ensuring that solo female adventurers can enjoy their stay with peace of mind. By focusing on these essential factors, we provide valuable guidance that helps enhance the travel experience in this vibrant city.
intro: Discover the top hotels in Bangkok that prioritize safety, cleanliness, and exceptional amenities for women travelers.

hotels.name: Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel
hotels.description: Discover the luxurious Thai Retreat at Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel, where meticulously crafted Thai-inspired rooms blend traditional teak decor with modern amenities. Indulge in rejuvenating spa treatments, fitness classes, and family-friendly features, while savoring a diverse culinary experience across nine unique dining venues, from authentic Thai dishes to Italian and Japanese delights. Book your stay for an unforgettable escape where elegance meets comfort.
hotels.highlight: Offers luxurious Thai-inspired rooms, rejuvenating spa services, and diverse dining options across nine unique venues.

hotels.name: Shangri-La Bangkok
hotels.description: Shangri-La Bangkok combines luxury and comfort with its expansive 10,000-sqf Fitness Centre, Chi The Spa, and an array of dining options, including an award-winning restaurant. Guests can unwind in elegantly decorated rooms featuring Thai-inspired décor, modern amenities, and stunning city or river views. Enjoy a culinary journey with authentic Thai dishes at Salathip, exquisite meats at Volti Tuscan Grill & Bar, and delightful treats at The Chocolate Boutique, all set within a vibrant atmosphere of live music and upscale dining.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a 10,000-sqf Fitness Centre, Chi The Spa, and award-winning dining with stunning city or river views.
hotels.location: 89 Soi Wat Suan Plu, New Road

hotels.name: Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen’s Park
hotels.description: Discover luxury at Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen's Park, a serene retreat in the bustling city. Indulge in rejuvenating spa treatments and unwind by the stunning outdoor pool, or savor international flavors at one of four exceptional dining venues, including Goji Kitchen + Bar. With 1,388 elegantly designed rooms and convenient amenities like complimentary Wi-Fi and a 24-hour airport shuttle, your comfort and ease are guaranteed during your stay.
hotels.highlight: Offers a full spa, outdoor pool, and 1,388 elegantly designed rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi and 24-hour airport shuttle.

hotels.name: Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok
hotels.description: Discover luxury and comfort at Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok, ideally situated in the city's vibrant heart. Enjoy a range of amenities, including a stunning outdoor pool, a 24-hour fitness center, and delectable dining options at the River Barge Restaurant or via room service. With 396 chic guest rooms featuring kitchenettes and premium bedding, your stay promises both relaxation and convenience.
hotels.highlight: Offers chic guest rooms with kitchenettes, a stunning outdoor pool, and a 24-hour fitness center for ultimate convenience.

hotels.name: The St. Regis Bangkok
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled luxury at The St Regis Bangkok, nestled in the vibrant commercial district. Each spacious room features elegant decor with Thai artwork, while world-class amenities include a rejuvenating spa, a stunning outdoor pool, and personalized butler services. Indulge in exquisite dining with breathtaking skyline views at IGNIV Bangkok and VIU restaurant, making your stay truly unforgettable.
hotels.highlight: Offers luxurious rooms with Thai artwork, a rejuvenating spa, outdoor pool, and personalized butler services for a refined stay.

hotels.name: JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok
hotels.description: Experience luxury at the JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok, where elegantly furnished rooms feature flat-screen TVs and soundproof walls, reflecting the rich Thai culture in their design. Located near Ploenchit and Nana BTS Skytrain stations, you can easily explore vibrant shopping hotspots like Central World and MBK Mall. Enjoy world-class amenities, including a rejuvenating spa, an inviting outdoor pool, and diverse dining options, making this hotel the perfect retreat for a memorable stay.
hotels.highlight: Offers elegantly furnished rooms, a rejuvenating spa, private check-in/out, and easy access to BTS Skytrain stations.
